question: Is Ghusl necessary if I do not wash after nature call.
answer:
QUESTION
Assalam alaikum Mufti sab.Suppose I did not wash after nature call (or I might have washed with impure water after having tools). After reaching home Do I have to do Ghusl to read namaz ? Or can I do namaz by washing private parts and wearing pak cloths.
ANSWER


Share:
There is no need to make Ghusl to purify yourself. You may wash the private
parts and change your clothes.

That is sufficient to purify you.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
